name: Moonlight Stalker
text: You are adept at using shadows to conceal your attacks.
prerequisites: Int 13, Blind-Fight, Combat Expertise, Bluff 3 ranks, darkvision or low-light vision racial trait.
benefit: While you have concealment from an opponent, you gain a +2 bonus on attack and damage rolls against that opponent.
staminaText: When you have total concealment from an opponent, you can spend 2 stamina points to increase your bonuses on attack and damage rolls from this feat to +4.
text_zh: 你善于利用阴影来隐藏自己的攻击。
prerequisites_zh: 智力13，盲斗，寓守于攻，唬骗3级，【黑暗视觉】或【昏暗视觉】种族特性。
benefit_zh: 当你对一个对手获得隐蔽，你对其的攻击检定和伤害骰有+2加值。
staminaText_zh: 当你对一个对手有全隐蔽时，你可以消耗2点耐力来将你在这个专长所获得的攻击和伤害骰上的加值提升到+4。
